data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 111,137 lost people in  Jiayuguan, Gansu, China have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jiayuguan, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Jiayuguan, Gansu, China with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Jiayuguan.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Jiayuguan, Gansu, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kalmyk-Oirat people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kalmyk-Oirat people know you.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Jiayuguan. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Jiayuguan.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Jiayuguan, Gansu, China.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

location.name: Jiayuguan
location.people_groups_list: Qiang, Jiaochang, Sogwo Arig, Yonzhi, Tebbu, Dongxiang
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Qiang, Jiaochang (33,000), Sogwo Arig (50,000), Yonzhi (4,200), Tebbu (26,000), Dongxiang (642,000)
